Reviews.Author: ANGELA J.
Reviews.Content: Got this for my tech illiterate mom.  seems easy for her to use, need to get a better screen protector, and a case but great value
Reviews.Title: great first tab

Reviews.Author: Abdheshwar Sharma
Reviews.Content: the tablet is good for its price, i got it today. So far m loving it. it also came with screen protector :)
Reviews.Title: good for price paid

Reviews.Author: talafiana singh
Reviews.Content: I bought this product before going on vacation to leave with family back home and they love it, they can skype me easily, facebook play games and use all kinds of other apps. They absolutely enjoy it and now more of my nieces and nephews would like one of their own too.. =) Very happy that they enjoy this product, enjoy my gift. I will definitely order more before my next trip... it just makes a perfect gift. works great. thanks so much
Reviews.Title: great gift

Reviews.Author: Smart Dealer
Reviews.Content: THIS PRODUCT IS VERY GOOD TO USE WITH PICTURE AND USE THE OFFICE FOR PLANNING.IS SHORTER AND EASY TO USE FOR ALL PROPOUSESHIGHLY RECOMMENDED
Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE

Reviews.Author: Tsandhu
Reviews.Content: I got my android shipped in way sooner than I expected. I feel I got a great deal. I use it to get in touch with my relatives over seas through Skype and all.. And it works great, picture is clear, sound is clear. In fact a colleague ordered one for himself as soon as he tested mine out..
Reviews.Title: My first android experience

Reviews.Author: bruce auman
Reviews.Content: This will be a birthday gift for a young teenager and seems a perfect tablet for a young person that can be rough on devices
Reviews.Title: Great price

Reviews.Author: Angela WIlliams
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 5th grader for his graduation.  He is quite tech savy so this tablet is ideal for him.  The price was great for the features on this tablet
Reviews.Title: great product

ProductInfo.Features:
Built on the latest Google Android Jelly Bean 4.2.2 with voice commands it has a smoother, faster UI response, powerful search and notification handling, and Google Play Store is packed full with apps and media. Netflix, Angry Birds, Fruit Ninja, Youtube, Facebook are pre-installed and ready to run out of the box. 8GB on board memory, with 5.5GB Free
High Resolution 800x480 7-inch display screen makes reading e-books and running apps clearer. Responsive capacitive touch with 5 point multi-touch screen makes for quicker swipes, pinches & zooming. Stream your favorite Netflix via wireless WiFi connection or add 32GB of video and music via the Micro SD slot.
Stay connected with Wi-Fi (802.11 a/b/g) or connect via the OTG cable to 3G/4G dongles for additional connectivity. And with its Dual Camera design, you can capture that special moment in High Resolution with its built-in 2.0 Megapixel rear camera for capturing picture and live video. Switch over to the 0.3 Megapixel Front-facing camera for a selfie, Snapchat, Skype & Video calling.
30 day full money back Guarantee. FastTouch(TM) represenatives also provide email support. Don't forget to add a SquareTrade 2-year Accident Protection Plan for under $11 for drops, spills, or hardware failure. (A cracked screen can cost $25 to repair!) http://www.amazon.com/SquareTrade-2-Year-Electronics-Accident-Protection/dp/B0045DT46O
NEW FastTouch® features the latest 2014 powerful Dual Core Allwinner A23 CPU with top clock speeds of 1.2GHz for superior multi-tasking, ultra-fast 512MB DDR3 RAM for running apps, and a Quad Core Mali-400 GPU for smoother 3D graphics in gaming and multimedia.NEW FastTouch® features the latest 2014 powerful Dual Core Allwinner A23 CPU with top clock speeds of 1.2GHz for superior multi-tasking, ultra-fast 512MB DDR3 RAM for running apps, and a Quad Core Mali-400 GPU for smoother 3D graphics in gaming and multimedia.
ProductInfo.Name: White 7 Inch GOOGLE Android AllWinner Tablet PC, A23 Dual Core, (8GB) Boxchip Cortex A8 1.2Ghz MID Capacitive Touch Screen G-Sensor WiFi, Camera, Skype Video Calling, NetFlix Movies, Flash Supported, By FastTouch(TM)
